attributes.action: seek that law to ban vetinary surgeons or others from docking the tails of "traditionally docked breeds" of dogs is rigorously enforced.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is for people to wish the exact opposite of a petition already on this site to allow the "docking" of dogs' tails to meet breed requirements.

Dog's tails have important functions, including behavioural ones to communicate emotion, loss of which in our view seriously harm the animal.

Nothing in this petition is intended to prevent the treatment of dogs to cure genuine medical problems.
